member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Program.MainInternal(System.String[],NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandOutputLogger)
member.summary: Internal Main. This is used for testing.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Program.TryParseVerbosity(System.String[],Microsoft.Dnx.Runtime.Common.CommandLine.CommandOption,NuGet.Common.LogLevel@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the desired log verbosity from the arguments. Returns true if the arguments contains a valid verbosity option. If no valid verbosity option was specified, the log level is set to a default log level and false is returned.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies the version of MSBuild to be used with this command. Supported values are 4, 12, 14. By default the MSBuild in your path is picked, otherwise it defaults to the highest installed version of MSBuild..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No API Key was provided and no API Key could be found for {0}. To save an API Key for a source use the 'setApiKey' command..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Prevent default exclusion of NuGet package files and files and folders starting with a dot e.g. .svn..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify if the command should not run package analysis after building the package..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.NoSymbols_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If a symbols package exists, it will not be pushed to a symbols server..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to http://docs.nuget.org/.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} Version: {1}.

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Push_Timeout_Error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Pushing took too long. You can change the default timeout of 300 seconds by using the --timeout <seconds> option with the push command..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Arg_ProjectName_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to List of projects and project folders to restore. Each value can be: a path to a project.json or global.json file, or a folder to recursively search for project.json files..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Restores packages for a project and writes a lock file..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The NuGet configuration file to use..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_DisableParallel_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Disables restoring multiple projects in parallel..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_Fallback_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A list of packages sources to use as a fallback..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_IgnoreFailedSource_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Only warning failed sources if there are packages meeting version requirement.

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_NoCache_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Do not cache packages and http requests..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_Packages_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Directory to install packages in..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Restore_Switch_Source_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies a NuGet package source to use during the restore..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Serviceable_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Sets the nuspec serviceable element to true..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Source_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies the server URL.

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Suffix_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Appends a pre-release suffix to the internally generated version number..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Switch_Verbosity
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The verbosity of logging to use. Allowed values: Debug, Verbose, Information, Minimal, Warning, Error..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.SymbolApiKey_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The API key for the symbol server..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Symbols_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Determines if a package containing sources and symbols should be created. When specified with a nuspec, creates a regular NuGet package file and the corresponding symbols package..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.SymbolSource_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies the symbol server URL. If not specified, nuget.smbsrc.net is used when pushing to nuget.org..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Tool_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Determines if the output files of the project should be in the tool folder..

member.name: P:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Strings.Version_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Overrides the version number from the nuspec file..

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.NativeMethods.Unix.GetUname
member.summary: Returns the uname (short for unix name) that has the name, version and details about the current machine and OS running on it.

member.name: T:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandOutputLogger
member.summary: Logger to print formatted command output.

member.summary: Hash code creator, based on the original NuGet hash code combiner/ASP hash code combiner implementations

member.summary: Create a unique hash code for the given set of items

member.summary: Compares two enumberables for equality, ordered according to the specified key and optional comparer. Handles null values gracefully.

member.param: The function to extract the key from each item in the list
An optional comparer for comparing keys
